name: Stormform Singer (Deflect 1)

features.Water Weakness: While the stormform is drenched in water, they cannot use Bolt of Lightning or Electrical Charge.
features.Barbed Carapace: While the stormform is restrained by a grapple or similar effect, the character restraining them is Afflicted [1d8 keen].

action.name: Strike: Shortspear
action.description: Attack +6, reach 5 ft., one target. Graze: 4 (1d8) impact damage. Hit: 10 (1d8 + 6) keen damage.

action.name: Storm Leap (1 Investiture)
action.description: The Regal jumps up to 60ft. If they land within 5ft of an enemy, they can use Gain Advantage as a Free Action.

bi_action.name: Bolt of Lightning (1 Investiture)
bi_action.description: Attack +7, range 60 ft., one target. This attack gains disadvantage unless the Regal spends 1 focus. Graze: 8 (2d8) energy damage. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 7) energy damage.

reaction.name: Electrical Charge
reaction.description: After the Regal uses the Move action, they become electrically charged until the start of their next turn. Any creature that hits a melee attack within 5ft against the Regal while they are charged takes 4 (1d8) energy damage.

tactics: A stormform Regal is a cunning foe, one specialized in closing distances and defending themself. The Regal uses Storm Leap to jump to a weak-looking foe, hoping to goad them into taking damage from Electrical Charge. Meanwhile, the Regal alternates between using their Shortspear and Bolt of Lightning to strike injured enemies.
